summary: The Router class acts as a central orchestrator for interacting with multiple AI model deployments. It abstracts various model capabilities (e.g., text completion, embedding, image generation, transcription) behind a unified interface, handling routing decisions, health checks, cooldown logic, fallback strategies, retries, and usage tracking.
business_intent: To provide a resilient and configurable routing layer that dynamically selects the optimal model deployment for a request, ensures high availability through fallbacks and retries, enforces policy constraints, and simplifies client interaction with diverse AI services.
